unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? Good stuff! My granddad in Kerala always said, "Go back to basics!" Remember those days, no crazy chemicals, just good ol' cow dung compost from 19/05/1965. My cousin Priya tried it near Lucknow - amazing results, by 20/02/2024. Though yield might be a bit less, the taste is so much better, like what my nani used to make. Need more farmers like Rajesh from IIT Kharagpur, pushing for this. Costs are a concern though – any ideas after 03:00 PM today? Let's make Bharat organic again! Jai Hind!
normalised: Organic farming, eh? Good stuff! My granddad in Kerala always said, "Go back to basics!" Remember those days, no crazy chemicals, just good old cow dung compost from nineteenth may nineteen sixty five. My cousin Priya tried it near Lucknow - amazing results, by twentieth february two thousand and twenty four. Though yield might be a bit less, the taste is so much better, like what my nani used to make. Need more farmers like Rajesh from I I T Kharagpur, pushing for this. Costs are a concern though – any ideas after three zero zero P M today? Let's make Bharat organic again! Jai Hind!
